name: SPEED ROGUE | "Greybox Alpha 0.1"
description:
Speed Rogue is a fast-paced shooter and 3D platformer with hints of exploration and a lot of focus on game feel, where you have to find around the level the multiple hidden keys that open the doors to the end of the game.

This is my currently in-development personal project. But I put together this small build with all the content so far for everyone to play.

All feedback is welcome! Leave your comments below!!

Gameplay
Controls ControllerKeyboardRotateRight joystickMouseTurboRight buttonMouse right buttonShootLeft buttonMouse left buttonLateral movementLeft joystickA DDodgeLateral movement + BLateral movement + SpaceSlow downLeft joystick down/backS

Camera speed, camera shake and damage taken can be adjusted from the options menu (Strat / Esc).
